GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Document Editor, Pushmail  (Microsoft Exchange Active Sync), Adobe Acrobat Reader, Lync (Corporate IM), Company Hub for Enterprise Applications, Excel, PDF, Word, Power Point, OneNote, Outlook Mobile, Office 365, Outlook.com
GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: Nokia Headset WH-208, SIM Door Key, Quick Guide, Nokia Charging and Data Cable CA-190CD, Nokia Lumia 1520, Nokia AC-60 Micro USB Charger

Multimedia.Sound Enhancement: Integrated Hands-free Speakers, Multimicrophone Uplink Noise Cancellation, Album Graphics Display in Music Player, Audio Streaming, Dolby Headphone, Cloud Music Offline Playback, Graphical Equalizer, Podcasts, Cloud Music Playback, Nokia Rich Recording with Four Microphones
Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports AVI, MP4, WMV, MOV, 3GP, 3G2, M4V, Full HD

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v4, Supported Profiles (HFP 1.5, GAVDP 1.2, A2DP 1.2, PBAP 1.1, OPP 1.1, AVRCP 1.4)

Other Features.Sensors: Magnetometer, Accelerometer, Proximity Sensor, Orientation Sensor, Gyroscope, Ambient Light Sensor

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

Display.Other Display Features: Super Sensitive Touch, Corning Gorilla Glass 2, Brightness Control, High Brightness Mode, Easy to Clean, Wide Viewing Angle, Lumia Color Profile, ClearBlack, Refresh Rate 60 Hz, IPS Display, Sunlight Readability Enhancements, Nokia Glance Screen
